title: Add a component to access local camera
body:
### User Story

As a developer, I want a component giving access to local camera and gallery images. This allows developers to access raw image data.

 This will require proper permissions.

### Description

*Type*: Feature

Issue Status: 1. **Open** 2. Started 3. Submitted 4. Done

Please join status for inquiries; i've approved cr2fx on another bounty so will be glad to see you try to tackle this one @mushroomgenie https://get.status.im/chat/public/status-core
Join the public chat: #status-core in Status

@mushroomgenie Hello from Gitcoin Core - are you still working on this issue? Please submit a WIP PR or comment back within the next 3 days or you will be removed from this ticket and it will be returned to an ‘Open’ status. Please let us know if you have questions!
* [x] reminder (3 days)
* [ ] escalation to mods (6 days)

Funders only: Snooze warnings for [1 day](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/6596/1745?snooze=1) | [3 days](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/6596/1745?snooze=3) | [5 days](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/6596/1745?snooze=5) | [10 days](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/6596/1745?snooze=10) | [100 days](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/6596/1745?snooze=100)
What about to components? One for webcam and other to local photos?
@millnitzluan I guess it makes sense to have a separate components for local photos. And maybe a button to navigate to it from the camera component? Both are usually combined.
@jeluard I've never worked with clojure, I'll look into that and maybe I'll apply to work on that.
@tbenr You might want to look at this one too? :)
@jeluard yes - I apply for it but I have to finish the backlog first :)
@jeluard I can't apply for this unless you close ipfs/add on gitcoin (gitcoin permits max 3 works in parallel).
@andytudhope Can you help with that?
@jeluard @andytudhope still cant apply this even if i'm only working on 2... can you extend time (it is going to expire in 12h)
Working on it! @tbenr just ping @StatusSceptre for now because @andytudhope is OOO for a bit.
Can you apply for it now? @tbenr it doesn't look like anyone is assigned atm.

Issue Status: 1. Open 2. Started 3. Submitted 4. **Done**

let me start working on extension components too :)
